hero.name: Freelance
hero.description: I build scalable web applications, enterprise systems, and automation solutions with a focus on performance and user experience.

about.title: Professional Profile
about.description: Software engineer focused on building robust web solutions, API integrations, and process automation. I work with clean architecture principles and best practices to create maintainable and scalable products.

project1.title: Workshop Management System
project1.description: Web-based inventory and operations management system with authentication, real-time stock tracking, and administrative dashboard.
project1.problem: Reduces operational losses and improves traceability of parts through a centralized management system.

project2.title: Real Estate Conversion Landing Pages
project2.description: High-conversion landing pages with backend integration and automated email workflows.
project2.problem: Improves lead generation and streamlines follow-up processes with potential clients.

project3.title: Tourism Claims Management Platform
project3.description: Full-stack complaint management platform with authentication, admin dashboard, reporting system, and secure data handling.
project3.problem: Centralizes claim handling and improves customer response efficiency for travel agencies.
